ai.summary: MST27 is a short, easy 0.8 km hike in the UK designed for beginners and families. The route offers a gentle stroll on flat paths with light scenery, making it a good option for a quick outdoor outing or a practice walk.
ai.terrain_summary: Flat, well-maintained footpaths with occasional grassy or gravel sections. Expect some damp patches after rain; surfaces can be uneven near hedges or tree roots.
ai.safety_notes: Check the weather forecast before you go and dress in layers; wear sturdy footwear with good grip. Stay on marked paths and follow any local signs; be mindful of other walkers, cyclists, and livestock if the route passes through fields. Bring a charged mobile phone and a small amount of water; tell someone your plans if hiking alone.
recommended_gear: Phone with offline map or route saved
ai.best_seasons: All year round with appropriate clothing; spring and summer are most comfortable, autumn offers milder weather, and winter hikes require waterproof gear and warm layers.

seo.title: MST27: Easy 0.8 km Hike in the UK (Beginner Friendly)
seo.meta_description: Discover MST27, an easy 0.8 km hike in the UK. Flat terrain, minimal elevation gain, perfect for beginners and families. Includes safety tips and gear list.
